A squad of guards in ceremonial decorations came out. The last two
carried a bulky electronic thing that took much place.

Squad chief: Welcome, Milady, to Relay City. Before I can let you go
forward, I would like to make you pass the security test. Please
remain still.

The last two guards advanced with the thing and deployed it. It was an
elaborate scanner that detected certain weapons, but no traces of
dangerous devices and programs.

Squad Chief: I must now ask you and your guards to leave all your
weapons in this case. It's reserved for you only so no one else will
open it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> LAdy Spire:
> 
> Lady Spire shuttle just landed and two guards left the shuttle
before she did it, looking around said "Hello? it's any body in home?"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, August 13, 2005 3:35 PM
>   Subject: Re: Towards the Meeting:
> 
> 
>   The final preparations had been made. Razorwing was ready to greet his
>   guests with the impatience that so marked him these days.
> 
>   He was soon informed that Lord Jotunn's personal shuttle had landed.
>   Custom procedures were underway, and security guards were making sure
>   he wasn't dangerous at that precise moment.
> 
>   Razorwing informed all his personel to direct the other Lords to the
>   Gargantis Tower for the reunion.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
>   > LAdy spire,
>   > 
>   > Tired Spire to wait an answer from the Maximal.  So, She lef her
>   quarters and walked towards the shuttle. Soon she was leaving towards
>   Razorwing's base
>
